Warning

To use this demo you need to configure the contact form customizing the following files: acf-demo.js and ajax-contact-form/php/config.php

Google ReCaptha

Before using this tool you must obtain public and private keys for the Google Recaptcha.
You can find keys at https://www.google.com/recaptcha/
